## Code Standards & Patterns

### File Structure
- Component files: kebab-case (`user-profile.tsx`)
- Named exports for components
- TypeScript interfaces for object shapes
- Structure: components â†’ subcomponents â†’ helpers â†’ types

### React/TypeScript Guidelines
- Function keyword for pure functions, const for typed arrow functions
- Always declare proper types (avoid `any`)
- Boolean naming: isLoading, hasError, canDelete
- Function naming: start with verbs (handleClick, executeAction)
- Declarative JSX with proper error handling and loading states

### Styling & Accessibility
- **Always use Tailwind classes only** (no CSS/inline styles)
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Include accessibility features (aria-labels, tabindex)
